node.title: Smart Home Hub
node.description: IoT-based parking management using ultrasonic sensors and LoRaWAN communication. Features real-time availability on mobile app, smart routing, and seamless payments. Analyzes data to predict parking patterns and monitor environmental impact. Demonstrates IoT's role in improving urban living and sustainability.

node.title: IoT Weather Station
node.description: Autonomous drone fleet for precision farming. Equipped with multispectral cameras and environmental sensors. Uses edge computing for real-time processing. Central station plans missions and aggregates data. Machine learning assesses crop health and predicts yields. Integrates with automated irrigation and fertilization systems.

node.title: Pothole Detection System
node.description: IoT health monitor for independent seniors. Wearable device tracks vital signs, communicating with home base station. Edge AI detects anomalies and provides early warnings. Features include cloud storage, caregiver mobile app, and voice-activated emergency calls. Enhances elderly independence while ensuring caregiver peace of mind.

node.title: Firefighter Monitoring System
node.description: Real-time weather monitoring and forecasting device.Real-time weather monitoring and forecasting device.Real-time weather monitoring and forecasting device.Real-time weather monitoring and forecasting device.
